page.title: 18Schools
page.content: HILLSIDE My first school was Hillside.It was quite a small school with four to eight year olds. One of the teachers taught recorders and guitar .And they have pigeons in the roof .The hall was an old barn.The hall is used for T.V. dinner and gym. ST.MARTIN'S The school we go to now is called St. Martins. The headteacher's name is Mr Gilbert. We only take eight to eleven year olds. We have a separate television room as well.We have got a heated swimming pool and a big playground.We have a separate hall from the gym.The main subjects are Maths, English, project, R.E, journal, Catchwords, Handwriting, S.R.A. WORLE SCHOOL Some children from St.Martin's go to Worle School which is for ages 11-16.
